SEARCH
Package controller

Class ApplicationController

Object
ApplicationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicationService
public class ApplicationController extends Object implements IApplicationService
Handles application-related operations such as applying for BTO, requesting withdrawals, and viewing application status. Implements the IApplicationService interface. IApplicationService.

    • createApplication

      public BTOApplication createApplication(int id, Applicant applicant, String projectName, FlatType flatType, ApplicationStatus status, boolean withdrawal)
      Creates a new BTOApplication object, stores it, and returns it.
      Specified by:
      createApplication in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to assign (0 to auto-increment).
      applicant - The applicant creating the application.
      projectName - The name of the BTO project.
      flatType - The type of flat selected.
      status - Initial status of the application.
      withdrawal - Whether a withdrawal has been requested.
      Returns:
      The created BTOApplication object.

    • isEligible

      public boolean isEligible(Applicant applicant, FlatType flatType)
      Checks if the applicant is eligible to apply a specified project based on age and marital status.
      Specified by:
      isEligible in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to check.
      flatType - The type of flat they wish to apply for.
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise.

    • applyProject

      Specified by:
      applyProject in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant applying for the flat.
      project - The BTO project applied for.
      flatType - The selected flat type.
      Returns:
      The newly created application.

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Approves a withdrawal request. Sets status to WITHDRAWN and removes the application from the applicant.
      Specified by:
      approveWithdrawal in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      application - The application being withdrawn.

    • rejectWithdrawal

      Parameters:

    • hasAccessToApplication

      public boolean hasAccessToApplication(Officer officer, BTOApplication application)
      Checks if a given officer has access to the application, based on project assignment.
      Specified by:
      hasAccessToApplication in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer attempting to access.
      application - The application in question.
      Returns:
      true if officer is assigned to the same project, false otherwise.
